## PerformanceTrace.removeAttribute() method

Removes the specified custom attribute from a trace instance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeAttribute(attr: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  attr | string | Name of the custom attribute. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
